title: Ubisoft Going Free-to-Play?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.12.21
description:
Janet Garcia joins Greg to talk about Ubisoft's free-to-play focus, Assassin's Creed Valhalla: Wrath of the Druids reviews, and more! 

Follow Janet: https://twitter.com/Gameonysus

Time Stamps -
0:00:00 - Start
00:04:00 - Housekeeping
PSILY’s Ratchet and Clank: Rift Apart preview is up!
After this, we’re recording the Kinda Funny Podcast with Justin Roiland. It’ll be up tomorrow because of embargoes.
Joey and I are hosting an LG OLED stream tonight with DJ Khaled and Megan Fox. 5 p.m. PT. twitch.tv/evilgeniuses
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock
The Roper Report  -
00:08:30 - Ubisoft, Triple A, and the FTP race, Andy Robinson VGC
00:18:20 - Why did everyone immediately assume that free-to-play games CANT be a AAA experience? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:29:45 - Assassin’s Creed Valhalla: Wrath of the Druids Review Round-Up
00:37:35 - Ad
00:42:18 - Battlefield, Eddie @ GameSpot
00:47:00 - Remedy’s 6 Games, Joe Skrebbels @ IGN
00:53:18 - Scarlet Nexus Demo Incoming
00:53:43 - Knockout City Block Party is actually cool
00:56:32 - Out today
00:59:52 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
